name: FONDAZIONE ALTAGAMMA
goal:
Since 1992, Altagamma Foundation gathers High-End Italian Cultural and Creative Companies, recognized globally as authentic ambassadors of Italian style.
The mission is to increase the competitiveness of the High-End industry, contributing to Italyâ€™s economic growth.
The Altagamma members operate in multiple sectors among which fashion, design, jewellery, food, hospitality, automotive, yachts and wellness.
The purposes of Fondazione Altagamma are:
1- Represent Italian artisanal and industrial businesses that have earned an international reputation, operate primarily in the sectors of creation and have agreed to collaborate to find solutions to problems inherent to their business activity
2- Implement all possible means to encourage businesses in these sectors to start exporting or to expand their export activities, thereby promoting the prestige of Italy in the World.
3- Take all possible measures to ensure the development of the crafts used to make products and provide services of outstanding quality, thanks to a highly qualified labor force with a long-established reputation, and to adopt any approach or take any action that may contribute directly or indirectly towards the attainment of the aforementioned purposes of the Foundation.
4 - Monitor and advocate the moral values inherent to these activities, and safeguard them in any way appropriate.
5- Take all possible steps to:
a) Safeguard the aforementioned sectors from any legislation, regulations or charges whose implementation would constitute an obstacle to their normal expansion
b) Help the member companies change or adjust to the current business environment.
6- Highlight and gain recognition for the economic and social role played by the creative activities of our member businesses.
